description: Captain in Diamond Force. His Spiritia was absorbed by http://anidb.net/ch43707 [Sivil] and fell into an absent-minded state. However, he recovered after hearing http://anidb.net/ch10993 [Basara]`s songs. He died in combat against the Varauta army.Source: http://macross.anime.net/wiki/Kinryuu
name: Kinryuu
